title: Binomial Equations
text: Keep in mind that the equation to calculate binomial probabilities is: (n choose x) * $$p^x$$ * $$q^{n-x}$$, where n $$=$$ total trials, x $$=$$ trials with a success, p $$=$$ probabilty of success, and q $$=$$ probability of failure. You can also use most calculators nowadays to calculate binomial probabilities, in addition to the internet.
